metadata.title: CVE-2016-7551 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
chain_sip in Asterisk Open Source 11.x before 11.23.1 and 13.x 13.11.1 andCertified Asterisk 11.6 before 11.6-cert15 and 13.8 before 13.8-cert3allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (port exhaustion).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7551` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

asterisk - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-config - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-dahdi - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mobile - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-modules - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mp3 - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-mysql - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-ooh323 - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
asterisk-tests - 1:13.11.2~dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: asterisk package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:13.11.2~dfsg-1').
